title: Redfin Property Scraper - Stealthy Mode
description: Extract real estate property listings from Redfin.com using multi-method approach (JSON API, Playwright, Sitemap, HTML). Fast, stealthy, and cost-effective.

startUrl.title: Redfin City URL
startUrl.description: Full Redfin city page URL. Extract region ID automatically or provide manually.

regionId.title: Region ID
regionId.description: Redfin region ID (extracted from URL if not provided).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Property Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property detail page to extract complete descriptions, photos, and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Properties to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-1000).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent requests (3-5 recommended to avoid blocking).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Required: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended) to avoid blocking from Redfin.
